duties_responsibilities.duty: Formulate recommendations and implement solutions to technical issues
Participate in and seek training to maintain current technical knowledge
Develop complete knowledge of the firm's philosophy and policies and procedures
Promote the efficient operation of the firm by using talents in staff management and training
Make decisions with knowledge of general economic and political trends and proposed legislation
Develop a responsible, knowledgeable, and trained staff

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Accounting (CPA certification required)
